name: orDieWith
signature: { <E>(f: (e: E) => unknown): <A, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>) => Stream<A, never, R>; <A, E, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>, f: (e: E) => unknown): Stream<A, never, R>; }
description:
Keeps none of the errors, and terminates the stream with them, using the
specified function to convert the `E` into a defect.
documentation:
